ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend the course to another student doing research in optics. It gives a very good survey of the most important concepts in optics.
Yes, I will recommend it to others.

I would recommend it to any student who will be doing research in optics, since many of the components described here will be used every day, and a deeper understanding of how these components work is great.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Very necessary to my research and greatly deepened my understanding of modern optics.
It makes me have deep understanding about light emission, light guiding and light modulating.
I'm sure the knowledge I've garnered in this course will prove invaluable in my future research projects, which will no doubt involve many of the components and concepts described in this course.
